content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in bari the case involved a company called sigc and another party called drf the court ruled in favor of sigc and confirmed an order regarding the division of an apartment and a rustic property the court also approved a distribution plan for the proceeds from the property division individual shares were ordered to be paid to the parties involved and a transcription related to the property was cancelled additionally drf was ordered to pay court costs to sigc the judgment was issued on december 29 2015
